set.description: Set the map's fog information from this actor

set_instant.description: Immediately set the map's fog information from this actor without interpolation

fog_start.description: How far away from the camera the fog should start (be at 0% opacity)

fog_end.description: How far away from the camera the fog should end (be at 100% opacity)

start_on.description: Whether this light should be enabled when the map loads

interpolation_ticks.description: The number of physics ticks (60 per second) the fog color and distance transition should take
